about_the_game:
Steal, smash, and survive in this high-speed vehicular roguelike! You play as Monster Punk, an outlaw behind the wheel of a weaponized monster truck, pulling off insane heists in a lawless wasteland. Raid heavily guarded bases, outrun relentless robotic enforcers and upgrade your ride to take on bigger, deadlier targets. The bigger the heist, the bigger the chaos...
can you escape the madness and make it out alive & rich?



Your truck is more than a getaway vehicle, it’s a destruction machine! Upgrade its weapons, boost speed, improve armor, and tweak handling to survive longer, steal bigger, and escape faster. Equip devastating guns, rams, and turbo boosters, then hit the wasteland in style. Build the ultimate outlaw ride and turn your monster truck into a war machine!



Every heist is a win-or-die gamble. Once you blast your way in, you better be ready, because the moment the alarms go on, there’s no turning back! With No time to breathe, you're constantly on the run, fighting off deadly robotic enforcers who will stop at nothing to take you down. Drift, boost, and jump your way through the chaos, blasting enemies, running them over, and smashing through anything in your path. The bigger the risk, the bigger the reward. use your scores to upgrade your monster truck with better weapons, armor, and speed to take on even riskier heists. Only the boldest outlaws make it out alive. Will you?

legal_notice:
Age Rating & Content Warning:
This game features animated vehicular and combat violence. Players engage in high-speed heists, vehicular combat, and shootouts against robotic enemies. Expect explosions, crashes, and destruction physics, but no gore or realistic injury. Player discretion is advised for those sensitive to intense action and destruction-based gameplay.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit only
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Drift, Boost, and blast your way through high-speed raids in this top-down roguelike! As an outlaw in a monster truck, storm heavily guarded bases, smash through defenses, and gun down ruthless robot pursuers. Upgrade your ride, pull off insane stunts, and go for riskier heists… if you dare!
